/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Power lines crisscross above the street, a common sight in many cities. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Vehicles, including cars and buses, add a dynamic element to the scene, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, which shines brightly in the top right corner, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the cityscape.
